Marotta: If Dybala wants out…
By Football Italia staff

Juventus general manager Beppe Marotta admits “if Paulo Dybala wants to leave, it’ll be impossible to keep him.”

Speaking to Premium Sport before Juve’s 1-0 win against Fiorentina on Wednesday, Marotta also insisted he was “delighted” with Gonzalo Higuain, despite his struggle for goals, and revealed no Bianconeri players were lumbered with release clauses.

“€90m for Higuain? This campaign was created following Pogba’s sale and we’re delighted with Higuain,” explained the 60-year-old.

“Beyond all that, he’s important to our style of play. Advantage in Serie A? It’s premature to talk about points now.

“Many teams moved well in the transfer market. I think the League will be decided by games between the competing sides.

“Release clauses for Juve players? It’s crucial in a player-club relationship in Spain, but only Higuain and Pjanic had them in Italy. I’m against giving clauses to our players.

“Neymar’s transfer? The damage can’t be calculated that easily, and for me it goes beyond the €220m [Barca] pocketed.

“I also take into account that they lost a player like him towards the end of the transfer window.

“Dybala? The player is the one that decides his fate, and if he wants to leave, it’ll be impossible to keep him.

“Serie A? The League should have 20 teams instead of 18. It would benefit the national team, the show and the clubs.

“Pellegri? We’ve been following the lad for two years. We sounded him out, but the figures back then were far lower than what they are now.

“He’s among the best players of his generation, but he still has to become a champion.”

Marotta: If Dybala wants out…
By Football Italia staff

Juventus general manager Beppe Marotta admits “if Paulo Dybala wants to leave, it’ll be impossible to keep him.”

Speaking to Premium Sport before Juve’s 1-0 win against Fiorentina on Wednesday, Marotta also insisted he was “delighted” with Gonzalo Higuain, despite his struggle for goals, and revealed no Bianconeri players were lumbered with release clauses.

“€90m for Higuain? This campaign was created following Pogba’s sale and we’re delighted with Higuain,” explained the 60-year-old.

“Beyond all that, he’s important to our style of play. Advantage in Serie A? It’s premature to talk about points now.

“Many teams moved well in the transfer market. I think the League will be decided by games between the competing sides.

“Release clauses for Juve players? It’s crucial in a player-club relationship in Spain, but only Higuain and Pjanic had them in Italy. I’m against giving clauses to our players.

“Neymar’s transfer? The damage can’t be calculated that easily, and for me it goes beyond the €220m [Barca] pocketed.

“I also take into account that they lost a player like him towards the end of the transfer window.

“Dybala? The player is the one that decides his fate, and if he wants to leave, it’ll be impossible to keep him.

“Serie A? The League should have 20 teams instead of 18. It would benefit the national team, the show and the clubs.

“Pellegri? We’ve been following the lad for two years. We sounded him out, but the figures back then were far lower than what they are now.

“He’s among the best players of his generation, but he still has to become a champion.”

Juventus general manager Beppe Marotta admits “if Paulo Dybala wants to leave, it’ll be impossible to keep him.”

Speaking to Premium Sport before Juve’s 1-0 win against Fiorentina on Wednesday, Marotta also insisted he was “delighted” with Gonzalo Higuain, despite his struggle for goals, and revealed no Bianconeri players were lumbered with release clauses.

“€90m for Higuain? This campaign was created following Pogba’s sale and we’re delighted with Higuain,” explained the 60-year-old.

“Beyond all that, he’s important to our style of play. Advantage in Serie A? It’s premature to talk about points now.

“Many teams moved well in the transfer market. I think the League will be decided by games between the competing sides.

“Release clauses for Juve players? It’s crucial in a player-club relationship in Spain, but only Higuain and Pjanic had them in Italy. I’m against giving clauses to our players.

“Neymar’s transfer? The damage can’t be calculated that easily, and for me it goes beyond the €220m [Barca] pocketed.

“I also take into account that they lost a player like him towards the end of the transfer window.

“Dybala? The player is the one that decides his fate, and if he wants to leave, it’ll be impossible to keep him.

“Serie A? The League should have 20 teams instead of 18. It would benefit the national team, the show and the clubs.

“Pellegri? We’ve been following the lad for two years. We sounded him out, but the figures back then were far lower than what they are now.

“He’s among the best players of his generation, but he still has to become a champion.”

屌馬總老母

意大利媒體透露，主帥艾歷尼非常不滿比真歷在補時階段的超遠距離射門，並在球員通道內對他發火。

在斑馬軍團主場1-0擊敗費倫天拿中，主教練賽後氣沖沖地回到了更衣室。現在Premium Sport解釋了艾歷尼生氣的原因，指出是由於後備上場的比真歷在中圈隨意射門所造成的。

“最後一分鐘，比真歷在離門50米選擇了射門，”艾歷尼賽後大發雷霆。“這些東西讓我非常憤怒，因為對於一名參加了500場職業比賽的球員來說，我認為他應該繼續控制住皮球，讓比賽就此結束。”

貝拿迪斯基在instagram上回擊了來自球迷的辱罵，在回應中他表示“出場一分鐘並且慶祝勝利不是不謙遜”。貝拿迪斯基認為人們選擇立場和跟風充當鍵盤戰士的行為是反面教材，大家應該理性地思考，不要讓這種風氣延續下去。

祖雲達斯1-0戰勝費倫天拿的比賽中，他在比賽第82分鐘後備入替古亞達度，雖然沒有為球隊出場很長時間，但是在比賽結束後貝勒爺在instagram發帖慶祝勝利。他這一行為遭到了不友好的球迷的攻擊，他們認為球員只是踢幾分鐘還慶祝勝利，這是不謙虛的行為。

就在這留言下面，貝拿迪斯基回應了這些不和諧的聲音，他表示：“好吧，我發現我得在這裡強調一些本'應該'顯而易見的事情，確實如此，但是不幸的是似乎連最基本的事情都不能順理成章。就算上場比賽'一分鐘'後慶祝球隊的勝利(就像有些人在評論中寫到的那樣)也不算不謙虛！如果這算什麼的話，這是完全相反的！”

“我不想讓有些評論成為反面教材！我也有點厭倦了人們反對和從眾心理的忽視，在不需要負責任的情況下大喊大叫並且侮辱人，這些評論沒有任何意義。讓我們跳出傳統而且顯而易見的思維模式吧。”

Dybala: 'Trophies more than goals'

Paulo Dybala is relishing his remarkable form for Juventus, but “the important thing is to win trophies with the team.”

La Joya bagged a brace in this evening’s 4-0 victory over local rivals Torino.

“I am in a great moment of form and the team is helping me so much. We play well and attack in numbers, but the season has just begun, so we’ve got to continue like this,” he told Sky Sport Italia.

“On the first goal, I had Tomas Rincon behind me and the goalkeeper was going in one direction, so I changed my direction and fortunately the ball got through the gap with the defender.

“Goals are great, but the important thing is to win trophies with the team. We want to go all the way in all three tournaments again, albeit changing the Final result.”

Taking on the Number 10 jersey has only made Dybala stronger, as he has 10 goals in six Serie A games.

“At Palermo I had more space as a centre-forward and could counter into a lot of open turf. I like this system at Juve, because the Coach gives me room to move. My teammates make it much easier for me.”

While Dybala can’t stop scoring at the moment, teammate Gonzalo Higuain was benched for the Derby della Mole.

“It’s not a great period for him, because for a striker clearly it’s not nice when you don’t score. He just needs to relax and the goal will come when he least expects it.

“I was struggling to score at the start of last season too, but as soon as you break the ice, you keep on going.”

Andrea Agnelli has been given a one-year ban for his role in selling tickets to ultras, while Juventus have been fined €300,000.

It comes after prosecutor Giuseppe Pecoraro had demanded the FIGC’s court to ban the patron for two-and-a-half years and fine him €50,000.

The prosecutor had also asked for Juve to play two matches behind closed doors, plus another game with the Curva Sud sealed off.

Several members of the Curva in question are considered to have links with organised crime, but those punishments were not handed out.

It now remains to be seen how much the patron’s suspension will penalise him, given he was also recently appointed President of the European Club Association (ECA).

Juve plan 4-3-3 return?
By Football Italia staff

Juventus are reportedly planning a return to a 4-3-3 formation once Sami Khedira is back in peak condition.

Juve have been alternating between 4-2-3-1 and 4-4-2 without Khedira, and Tuttosport claims they will stick with Miralem Pjanic and Blaise Matuidi against Olympiakos this evening.

However, the newspaper claims Max Allegri is already thinking about how he will set his midfield up with the German, who returned to training on Tuesday.

Consequently, the Bianconeri could line up with three in the middle of the park, featuring Khedira as the holding player behind Pjanic and Matuidi.

祖雲達斯今年夏天重點引進的烏拉圭小將賓坦古在經歷了初期的磨合後，已經顯示出了他應有的水平，在同奧林比亞高斯的比賽中他表現出色，賽後獲得了一致好評。

賓坦古在這場比賽中和馬杜迪搭檔雙中場，打滿了90分鐘，一共有105次觸球，有77次傳球，傳球成功率高達93%。

而在防守端，賓坦古貢獻了5次攔截、3次搶斷和3次解圍，此外他還在2次高空球爭搶中獲得了勝利。從昨天的比賽來看，賓坦古不但能夠在防守端為球隊提供很大的幫助，在處理球和傳球環節上也做得非常好。

今年20歲的賓坦古新賽季已經代表祖雲達斯在歐聯中正選2場，而在意甲聯賽同費倫天拿的比賽中，他也完成了代表祖雲的首次正選，並且表現出色打滿全場，近來由於他的出色狀態，祖雲達斯在中場的排兵布陣上也有了更多選擇、輪換的餘地。

Milan “already regret buying Leonardo Bonucci and wish they’d spent that money on a top striker,” claims Pierpaolo Marino.
The former Napoli and Udinese director of sport has not been impressed by the Rossoneri’s €43m signing from Juventus.
“I think Milan already regret buying Bonucci,” Marino told Rai Sport.

“Vincenzo Montella didn’t want to switch to a three-man defence, but he found himself forced to change his plans by the arrival of Bonucci, but even that is not enough.
“I think that if Massimiliano Mirabelli and Marco Fassone could go back in time, they’d spend that money to buy Bonucci on a top striker instead.”
The Italy international defender was given the captain’s armband on his Rossoneri debut.

Italy are expected to start Bologna winger Simone Verdi rather than Antonio Candreva in a new 3-4-3 formation against Macedonia.

The World Cup qualifier kicks off in Turin on Friday at 19.45 UK time (18.45 GMT).

Coach Giampiero Ventura appears to be moving away from the 4-2-4 formation he has used thus far and tested out a 3-4-3 in training both yesterday and today.

According to Mediaset Premium, Verdi will be given his full Italy debut on the right side of the trident rather than Inter winger Candreva.

The 25-year-old has played for one minute as a substitute in the 2-1 friendly win in the Netherlands in March 2017.

Marco Parolo and Roberto Gagliardini should bolster the midfield in the absence of injured Daniele De Rossi and Lorenzo Pellegrini.

It’s a reunion of the BBC for Milan’s Leonardo Bonucci with ex-Juventus teammates Andrea Barzagli and Giorgio Chiellini.

祖雲達斯在下輪意甲聯賽中對陣拉素，不過經過國家隊比賽日後，祖雲可能會有8名球員無緣這場戰役。

此前祖雲陣中就有多名傷員，尤其是在中場位置，包括馬治斯奧、基迪拉和比真歷等人都因傷休戰。而在國家隊比賽日中，文素基治和巴沙利也遭遇到了傷病。雖然巴沙利和比真歷可能會在歐冠小組賽中復出，但侯韋迪斯和迪斯利奧兩人依然會因傷無緣這場比賽。

加上長期養傷的比亞察，在接下來和拉素的聯賽中，祖雲可能會有八名球員因傷缺席。

加拉塔沙雷主席Dursun Ozbek在接受採訪時表示，球隊會再次對祖雲中場艾沙姆提供報價。
今夏艾沙姆就接近加盟加拉塔沙雷，不過最終祖雲還是將這名中場留在了球隊。但是艾沙姆和祖雲的合同到本賽季結束後到期，媒體稱這名球場多面手可能會在1月份離開。
而加拉塔沙雷方面依然對艾沙姆很感興趣，球會主席Dursun Ozbek表示：“夏窗接近關閉的時候，我們原本和艾沙姆達成了協議，不過祖雲並沒有放球員離隊，我們會在冬歇期繼續為艾沙姆提供一份報價。”

【森保利兩年前明言智利衰象已呈，狠批球隊軍紀敗壞 | 體嘢報道】

智利在世界杯外圍賽最後一輪賽事不敵巴西，無緣晉身明年的決賽週。賽後智利國內輿論對此討論紛紛，報章《Las Últimas Noticias》更披露，前國家隊主帥森保利早已預言球隊軍紀廢弛，必定衰落，當中其矛頭更直指維達爾。森保利抨擊這位拜仁慕尼黑中場有酗酒問題。

事緣在2015年年底（時值智利奪得美洲國家杯冠軍）後，森保利與智利RadioAgricultura的幾位媒體記者進行了一次非正式的聚會，這位現正任教阿根廷國家隊的名帥向他們大吐苦水：

「現在的國家隊出了問題，很多球員已經不像以前一樣了。像華加斯（Eduardo Vargas，前賀芬咸前鋒）每次來到國家隊我都覺得他越來越差，馬迪亞斯．費南德斯（Matías Ariel Fernández，曾效力費倫天拿和AC米蘭的進攻中場）的表現也不是我期望的水平，比尼拿(Mauricio Pinilla，前阿特蘭大前鋒）每次來到國家隊就是在想著開派對，他們幾個人根本沒準備好應付接下來的世界杯外圍賽。」

「維達爾應該去看醫生。他一直酗酒而毫不克制。當我們從利馬坐飛機回智利的時候，他居然來問我能不能喝一杯，因為他在機艙里買了一瓶啤酒。我說不行，因為飛機裏還有其他人以及我們的足協領導人。」

「還有一次，維達爾和其他的球員讓國家隊的巴士司機去給他買酒喝，結果出事後巴士司機被迫辭職，但事實上大家都知道，元凶其實是維達爾。」

至於在英超打滾的山齊士和巴禾，森保利也有以下評價——
「山齊士總是戴上耳機，然後一個人吃早餐，根本不和別人聊天；巴禾作為隊長本來應該站出來，但是事實上國家隊的實權在其他人手裡。」「如果長此下去，智利再不改變就不可能入圍（世界杯）。」

在外圍賽早段（2015年年尾），智利戰績尚算理想，但森保利已經預見球隊隱患，希望大刀闊斧進行換血：

「我希望在2016年的百週年美洲國家杯大換血。像菲臘比摩拉(Felipe Mora，目前效力墨西哥球會Cruz Azul，司職前鋒)，迪亞高施華(Diego Alejandro Silva，效力智利球會C.D. Cobresal，司職後衛)，卡斯迪路(Nicolás Castillo，效力墨西哥球會UNAM，司職前鋒)，尤其是馬度拉拿(Nicolás Maturana，效力智利班霸高路高路，主踢進攻中場或翼鋒)，我個人認為這幾位才是智利現在最好的球員。」

「我需要這些球員，希望一到兩周這些球員就來國家隊進行集訓，我希望這些球會能夠給我放行。為什麼不？比爾沙之前在智利就這麼做，為什麼我不可以？」

但遺憾的是，森保利後來遭智利政府調查瞞稅行為，加上智利足協內部傾軋，使他大志未酬，提早離開智利國家隊。即使智利找上另一位阿根廷教頭比斯接掌帥印，而且成功衛冕美洲國家杯，但是球隊衰落跡象越來越明顯。維達爾曾經因為在通宵派對參與打鬥被智利警方調查，而巴禾太太亦曾經公開批評有國家隊球員因為醉酒未能參與訓練。如果森保利所言非虛，似乎智利如今的失利是不可避免的。

「我希望在2016年的百週年美洲國家杯大換血。像菲臘比摩拉(Felipe Mora，目前效力墨西哥球會Cruz Azul，司職前鋒)，迪亞高施華(Diego Alejandro Silva，效力智利球會C.D. Cobresal，司職後衛)，卡斯迪路(Nicolás Castillo，效力墨西哥球會UNAM，司職前鋒)，尤其是馬度拉拿(Nicolás Maturana，效力智利班霸高路高路，主踢進攻中場或翼鋒)，我個人認為這幾位才是智利現在最好的球員。」

「我需要這些球員，希望一到兩周這些球員就來國家隊進行集訓，我希望這些球會能夠給我放行。為什麼不？比爾沙之前在智利就這麼做，為什麼我不可以？」

但遺憾的是，森保利後來遭智利政府調查瞞稅行為，加上智利足協內部傾軋，使他大志未酬，提早離開智利國家隊。即使智利找上另一位阿根廷教頭比斯接掌帥印，而且成功衛冕美洲國家杯，但是球隊衰落跡象越來越明顯。維達爾曾經因為在通宵派對參與打鬥被智利警方調查，而巴禾太太亦曾經公開批評有國家隊球員因為醉酒未能參與訓練。如果森保利所言非虛，似乎智利如今的失利是不可避免的。
